message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth, but I'm open to discussing further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, considering my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $1,150,000 price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is substantial. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,120,000. This offer reflects my desire to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I value your willingness to negotiate. Considering my financial situation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,080,000. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
